actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Employees Health Benefits Act of 1959 to provide that the entire cost of health benefits under such Act shall be paid by the Government.

summary.text: Provides that the entire cost of health benefits under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Act of 1959 shall be paid by the Government. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 3006(a), (b), (d), 3007(a), (b), 3001)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Employees Health Benefits Act of 1959 to provide that the entire cost of health benefits under such Act shall be paid by the Government.
